CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Athleisure}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Luxury Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Luxury Fashion is arc {Vintage}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Luxury Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to Fast Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Athleisure to Vintage in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Fast Fashion and Luxury Fashion is {496}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Vintage and Luxury Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Vintage and Luxury Fashion is {80}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Vintage?
SC.A: The total flow output from Vintage is {241}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Luxury Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow input by Luxury Fashion is {1040}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 496? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {497} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 175? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {161} from {Vintage} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {80} from {Vintage} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 215 and 258? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {236} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Vintage}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Luxury Fashion to Vintage or from Fast Fashion to Athleisure?
NC.A: The flow from {Fast Fashion} to {Athleisure} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Athleisure to Luxury Fashion, from Fast Fashion to Luxury Fashion, or from Luxury Fashion to Fast Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Fast Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Athleisure} and {Luxury Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Vintage, Arc Athleisure, Arc Luxury Fashion, Arc Fast Fashion}.
